locpix.visualise.vis_img.img_2_grey#

img_2_grey(img: ndarray) → ndarray[source]#

converts img to 0 255 greyscale image

Parameters:

img (np.ndarray) – Image to be converted to greyscale

Returns:

Image in uint8 form greyscale

Return type:

img (np.ndarray)
